GOLD - Individual Market Analysis

CoT signals and diagnostics for Gold futures.

As of 2025-10-07

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • Gold's market is currently controlled by Speculators. Net speculative positioning is 26.72% of OI, while hedgers are net short at -13.46% of OI as of 2025-10-07.
  • Gold exhibits significant fading speculative flow and increasing hedger shorting.
  • No extreme positioning (1-year z-score) is currently identified.

Technical Summary:

  • Speculative net positioning has a z-score of -1.23, indicating below-average longs. Hedger positioning is at -0.75 z-score, also below average.
  • The 4-week flow is significantly negative at -5.36%, with negative momentum (-2.01), suggesting continued reduction of long exposure.
  • `flow_fading` and `flow_fade_vs_spec` signals are active, implying weakening buying pressure by speculators.
  • The reversal score is 1, indicating early tactical reversal conditions, although no explicit crowding or squeeze/exhaustion risk is flagged.

References:

  • Gold_CoT_Signals dataset, latest timestamp: 2025-10-07. Influential datapoints include Spec_Net_%OI, Hedger_Net_%OI, Spec_zscore, Flow_4w, reversal_score, and Price.
  • Daily futures open interest and volume by product would enhance flow analysis.
  • Inter-market relationships (e.g., USD index) would provide broader context.
